title: Personalized Science Education Design Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and basic proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment providing personalized feedback through learning analytics for professionals

learning_goals: Learning analytics tools can quantitatively assess learners' scientific problem-solving processes with ≥80% accuracy.
Self-regulated learning (SRL) scores (metacognition, time management, task persistence) improve by ≥15% based on minimal/guided instruction strategies.
Learning analytics visualizations enable identification of individual learning patterns and design of personalized educational strategies.

resources: Learning Analytics Platform (e.g., LMS Integrated System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
